data.message: Build duro_list_unreviewed_decisions tool: Implemented surfacing mechanism for Decision Closure System. Added list_unreviewed_decisions() to artifacts.py with filters: older_than_days, exclude_tags, include_tags. Added tool definition and handler to duro_mcp_server.py. Tested with real decisions - found 20 unreviewed decisions from Feb 10-12. Committed 9302dee, smoke test passed.
data.outcome: Implemented surfacing mechanism for Decision Closure System. Added list_unreviewed_decisions() to artifacts.py with filters: older_than_days, exclude_tags, include_tags. Added tool definition and handler to duro_mcp_server.py. Tested with real decisions - found 20 unreviewed decisions from Feb 10-12. Committed 9302dee, smoke test passed.
